1.0.0.en: add support for Sureflap Ped Door

1.0.1.en: add support for Sureflap Cat Flap

1.0.3.en: add trigger, condition and action cards

1.0.12.en: prevent the case that the position is unknown, fixed bug that you cannot find new devices, fixed bug profile image cannot be null

1.0.15.en: add surefeed device trigger card `weight changed`

1.0.22.en: bugfix in sending the initial value

1.0.23.en: bugfix when the image location isn't set

2.0.1.en:
fixed trigger bug when weight is < 0
 fixed bug switching bowl types

2.0.2.en: add trigger card: Bowl has been refilled

2.0.4.en: bugfix in Homey core. In 1.7.3 the function getId is now protected
